title: The Baker
description: A Small Town Enemies to Lovers Christmas Holiday Romance KileyIt seems stupid to hang onto things that happened a decade and a half ago, but when I run into Justin Clarke after so many years, all the hurt feelings he caused me in high school come rushing back.Unfortunately, I’m even more attracted to him than ever, and I need his help to bake three dozen cupcakes for my elementary class.It’s just business, and I refuse to let him get close to me to hurt me again…But when it becomes clear why things happened the way they did, a path seems to clear between us.And maybe, just maybe, we can have the love story we were always supposed to have.JustinRunning into the woman who gave me my first heartbreak as a teenager is the last thing I expect when I go do my brother a favor, but seeing her brings back all the memories I’ve tried to forget.I’m even more shocked when she asks for my help for something last-minute, but I can’t say no to her. I never could.The oven is not the only thing that heats up the kitchen…our tempers seem to be getting the better of us, but a truth is revealed that shocks us both.Maybe now that the air is cleared, I can finally have the chance to win the heart of the woman who’s always been the girl of my dreams.
author: Mazzy King
